message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999500.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $999500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'd be willing to pay $950000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $950000 is a bit lower than my initial asking price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if it's something you're interested in.
